transcription: looking for a place to eat in the city center.
i'd like to have some chinese food.
i am looking for a moderately priced place to eat, i am also looking to book a room in the bridge guest house hotel.
before i commit i have a few questions. what area is the hotel located in?
ok, 2 questions. 1 - what are the moderately priced restaurants in the center of town; and 2 - how many stars does the bridge guest house have? thanks!
that was all the questions i had. thank you very much for helping me.
i'd really like to take my client out to a nice restaurant that serves indian food.
i am looking for an expensive indian restaurant in the area of centre.
sure thing, please book for 6 people at 7:30 pm on saturday.
okay great! thank you so much. could you also help me find a 3 star hotel in the area. i don't need wifi either.
that sounds great. please book that now.
i have 6 people in my group.
2 nights, starting the same day as the reservation.
yes please. is there something else available in that area?
can we try for 1 night instead of 2? i'll need the reference number please.
